segments.text: Everything in this kitchen seems so routine at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands drying dishes, focused and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight from the window highlights the peaceful garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the overflowing sink behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's streaming down, wetting everything in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's growing, and her foot's already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, the boy's on that unsteady stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar without permission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by reaching up for one.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's naughty, but I remember doing the same as a kid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the dangers here make me worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the tidy outside is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR
